extendedInfo.description: Alchemy~Genetics. ATTENTION: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE!Game for people who have a sense of humor! Addictive like Alchemy, amazing like Genetics! Lots of fun, and many hours of gameplay.Combine different animals to create new species. Start with 4 and go up to 500, from obvious to unlikely to bizarre combinations. Play, enjoy and remember: this game was made for laughs! No animals were hurt :)Learn more about amazing animals by clicking the Wikipedia logo on the animal info page!Join the game community on Facebook and share combos with other players all over the world!---PREMIUM version:- No ads- Less permissions- Option to "lock" animals in TVs---In this game your elements are animals and "genes", and new breeds are created by adding a trait of one creature to another, for example:Ant + Rat [Tailed] = Scorpion (an arthropod with a tail)Anchovy + Chicken [Domestic] = Golden Carp (a domestic fish)Golden Carp + Scorpion = ???---NB! If you find a bug or something doesn't work for you, PLEASE get in touch with us via e-mail or Facebook! We'll do our best to fix it for you.

reviews.comment: I\'ve had this game for a while and I\'m really disapointed b/c the pictures have started to mix up.

reviews.title: THANK YOU!
reviews.comment: I\'m addicted and I can\'t seem to leave it alone! I am having a total blast, though. I am homebound but this cute little game brings me much cheer.

reviews.comment: When you update you need to check everything By adding a new creature. You removed the ability to make spiders in challenge mode.

reviews.title: pure excellence
reviews.comment: great fun, addictive, excellent graphics and combos...well set up, love being able to lock one creature to combine with others.best alchemy game on Android
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Game In or On the Market !
reviews.comment: Love this twisted logic brain teaser-next up date? want more Now Please-Even willing to PAY an AG II if need be-ONLY game i paid For on my droid !!!  I now have a \"real droid\" & can no longer say only app I paid for. However, my sister, her friends, AND her Boss, and my 70+yr Mom & my 13yr old son have ALL got the paid version after watching me play this game. Its also on all our K-Fires, laptops ect.  I need to work for these ppl-lol.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!!!!
reviews.comment: I have loved trying all the different alchemy style games and loved this one the most. Animals have various genetic attributes and combining them makes allsorts of weird and wonderful creatures. But unlike some other games, here even the order of the combination can produce different results and the direct wiki link to tell you more about the creature you created is a fab little bonus feature. 5* from me. Awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I wasted money on this!!!!!!! Its like the normal but with no ADDS! Who cares I wanted a refund, but NO.
reviews.author: ethan young

reviews.comment: Excellent! One of the most fun games of its kind...I could sit and play around with this game for hours!

reviews.comment: SERIOUSSLY WHERES YOUR REFUND BUTTON THIS IS BULL! UPGRADE AND MAKE ONE SO I CAN CLICK IT UGH
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Really want to like this game but it\'s just unpolished. You can only see what characteristics each animal has one at a time. And their is no list of animals and characteristics yet to be unlocked so you\'re stuck with trial and error instead of logic. What\'s worse is that the game will not combine two animals you\'ve put together but match your chosen animal to one halfway across the screen. Because there\'s two different ways to match it just becomes a massive exercise in frustration.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: it said i got all the ones aloud at 52 found yet on the trial i got 175 before it would no longer let me play

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Great game but have had to start over after updating my phone. Needs a save point because I\'m frustrated that all that time and effort is gone.

reviews.title: Great fun, great time-killer
reviews.comment: When I need to kill time, it\'s AG to the rescue. -1 star for tablet, though - really need the option to resize animal icon size. Screen rotation would be good, too.

reviews.title: So fun

I am forced to wipe out completed game & start all over again...some of these i\'ve memorized the steps to get them-i can get up to 325 in four hours now-i need a NEW A.G. Game soon! please & thank you
